document.full_text: forecasters put much of the nation's midsection on alert for rough weekend weather on saturday as the first front of spring warmth was set to bring strong, volatile storms, including tornadoes, to the region.
document.title: forecasters warn of severe weekend weather in midwest
lines_and_colors: forecasters put much of the nation's midsection on alert for rough weekend weather on saturday as the first front of spring warmth was set to bring strong, volatile storms, including tornadoes, to the region.
